resources.string: Transfer Money to your \nLoved Ones Instantly
Forgot your User ID or Password?
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile number
Use 8 or more characters with a mix letters, numbers & symbols
Position your card in the frame
I have read and agreed to the terms and conditions
I have read and agreed to the
Scan front side of your Emirates ID
Scan back side of your Emirates ID
We will never save or store your Emirates ID. \nYour details will be processed securely.
To make it easier, you can login with the Fingerprint that is already stored in this mobile
You need to accept the Terms and Conditions
Your loan has been booked and disbursed to your Card/Account
We will never save or store your Passport. Your details will be processed securely.
Please scan your Emirates ID again
User ID should be at least 8 characters with no spaces
Password should be at least 8 characters
Password should not contain User ID
New password should not be same as old password
Card name should be at least 2 characters
Currently, you do not have any loans with Finance House.
DOB does not match Emirates ID
Please select a valid area of issue
Please select a valid issue service
To make it easier, you can login with the Fingerprint that is already stored in this mobile
Please enter an amount multiple of 50
Sign in as a different user
Error in servicing your request. Please try after sometime.
Emirates Id expired or about to expire
Sorry! We are unable to process your request. Please try after some time.
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile number
Password Expired. Please update your password.
Allow \'Finance House App\' to save files on your device. \n\nTo enable this, click \'APP SETTINGS\' below and activate \'Storage\' under the permissions menu.
Access to camera has been prohibited. \n\nTo enable click \'APP SETTINGS\' below and activate \'Camera\' under the permissions menu.
Access to call has been prohibited. \n\nTo enable click \'APP SETTINGS\' below and activate \'Phone\' under the permissions menu.
I would like to apply for PayDay Finance from Finance House and hereby authorize Finance House to access my credit and financial information including Etihad credit bureau.
After confirming loan booking by entering the OTP the exact loan details will be sent via Email/SMS
Sorry\nYou are not authorized. Please contact employer for PayDay card.
Just select the \"Short Code\" for the required information and send an sms to 2326 in the format: [Short code][Space][Last 6 digits of the Card Number]\n\n e.g: MIN 123456
Are you sure to delete this beneficiary?
Are you sure to enable this beneficiary?
Are you sure to disable this beneficiary?
Name should not be less than 3 characters
The internet connection appears to be offline.

Please enter an amount between %1s AED and %2s AED
Please enter an amount between %1s AED and %2s AED
Please enter an amount between %1s %2s and %3s %4s

string-array.item: Last Transaction mode on your card

resources.string: Once you confirm booking your Top-up Loan, please refer to the updated Loan Details Screen reflecting the new total.
Tap on the transaction to initiate track request

Your Request has been successfully received.

Your Transaction ID is: %1s.

Your Transaction will be processed within the next 24 – 48 hours.
You will be redirected to external browser \nAre you sure you want to continue?
